professional.heading: professional background
professional.content: I'm a Consulting Senior Analyst at Deloitte, working in the AI & Data department where I help clients navigate the complexities of artificial intelligence and data management. My work involves designing and implementing AI solutions that transform how organisations operate, from streamlining data pipelines to developing intelligent systems that drive decision-making. I specialise in translating technical capabilities into business value, working closely with clients to understand their challenges and deliver solutions that make a real impact. My role spans the full project lifecycle, from initial discovery and strategy through to implementation and optimisation. I work with cutting-edge AI technologies and data platforms, constantly learning and adapting to the rapidly evolving landscape of machine learning, data engineering, and intelligent automation.

education.heading: education
education.content: I graduated from University College London in 2023 with a degree in Mechanical Engineering. While engineering might seem like a departure from my current work in AI and data, the analytical thinking and problem-solving skills I developed have been fundamental to my career trajectory. Engineering taught me to approach complex problems systematically, to break down challenges into manageable components, and to think critically about how systems interact. These principles translate directly to my work in AI and data consulting, where I'm constantly analysing systems, identifying patterns, and designing solutions that are both technically sound and practically implementable. My technical foundation in engineering provides a unique perspective when evaluating AI architectures and data infrastructure, allowing me to consider not just the software layer but the broader system implications.
